lead_paragraph: The attacker opened fire in a building in southern Saudi Arabia. The Interior Ministry described it as a “criminal” act and suggested it was unrelated to terrorism.

headline.print_headline: World Briefing | Middle East; Saudi Arabia: 6 Die in Shooting at Education Offices
headline.main: Six Killed in Shooting Rampage in Saudi Arabia

snippet: The attacker opened fire in a building in southern Saudi Arabia. The Interior Ministry described it as a “criminal” act and suggested it was unrelated to terrorism.
abstract: Saudi Arabian authorities arrest unnamed perpetrator who shot up education administrative building day before and killed six employees; say attack was 'criminal,' implying it was not terrorist related.
